summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        Your task: Provide a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image, focusing on its relevance to gameplay. 
        Describe key visual elements such as characters, enemies, UI components (e.g., health bars, icons), environments, or any text hints present. 
        Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a combat scene from a video game, featuring a player character engaged in battle with a large, armored enemy. The enemy has a visible health bar above it, indicating its current health status. The player character is wielding a weapon with a glowing effect, suggesting a special attack or power-up. The environment is a dark, rocky area with sparse vegetation and structures in the background. The user interface displays various elements: on the bottom left, there are icons for abilities or items with quantities, and a health bar with a blue and yellow meter. On the bottom right, additional icons likely represent skills or powers available to the player. A text overlay on the right side shows "Will x35," possibly indicating a resource or currency used in the game.
